BodyName: Committee on Civil and Human Rights
Location: HYBRID HEARING - Committee Room - City Hall

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a public information and outreach campaign regarding safe access to reproductive health care
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Public information and outreach campaign regarding safe access to reproductive health care.

Items.Title: Resolution congratulating the State Legislature for approving S.15002/A.41002, a resolution proposing an amendment to the New York State Constitution in relation to equal protection, and calling on the Legislature to approve this amendment again next session so that it may be submitted to the voters of New York State for approval.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Proposing an amendment to the NYS Constitution in relation to equal protection, and calling on the Legislature to approve this amendment again next session so that it may be submitted to the voters of NYS for approval.. (S.15002/A.41002)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a public information and outreach campaign regarding safe access to reproductive health care
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a public information and outreach campaign regarding safe access to reproductive health care
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a public information and outreach campaign regarding safe access to reproductive health care
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
